A

addKeyboardControl(KeyboardControl) - Method in class framework.core.Application
Adds the keyboard control to the listeners of the frame.

Application - Class in framework.core
The Class Application is a singleton for a window frame with separate update-thread.

The Enum ApplicationState.

C

Canvas - Class in framework.core
Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
CanvasObject - Class in framework.objects
The Class CanvasObject is an abstract base object for all objects that will be painted.

Instantiates a new canvas object.

A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

Create a new circle at default position with default color.

Create a new circle at a given position, with color and diameter.
Clickable - Interface in framework.interfaces
The Interface Clickable that is used to receive mouse-events.
Collisionable - Interface in framework.interfaces
The interface Collisionable for custom collision-detection.

dispose() - Method in class framework.core.UpdateObject

F

framework.core - package framework.core
Contains the main-functionality of the framework.
framework.events - package framework.events
All Events that are provided with the framework, such as window, mouse and keyboard.
framework.interfaces - package framework.interfaces
Contains important interfaces.
framework.objects - package framework.objects
All objects available to draw, update, click, drag and so on.

T

terminate() - Method in class framework.core.Application
Terminates the application by interrupting the update thread and terminating the canvas.
Text - Class in framework.objects
The Class Text displays text on a given position, with a certain color and font.
Text(int, int, String) - Constructor for class framework.objects.Text
Instantiates a new text with position and text.
Text(int, int, String, Font, Color) - Constructor for class framework.objects.Text
Instantiates a new text with a given position, text, font and color.
Time - Class in framework.core
The class Time for calculating time-gaps between update-calls, normally an gap should be 16 ms.
Time() - Constructor for class framework.core.Time
Instantiates a new time-instance.
TimedControl - Interface in framework.events
The listener interface for receiving timed events.
TimedEvent - Class in framework.core
The Class TimedEvent is an Event special for timed things.
TimedEvent(Object, long) - Constructor for class framework.core.TimedEvent
Instantiates a new timed event.
TimerThread - Class in framework.core
The Class TimerThread handles all events that are timed, such as moving an object every second.
TimerThread(Application) - Constructor for class framework.core.TimerThread
Instantiates a new timer thread.
Triangle - Class in framework.objects
A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
Triangle() - Constructor for class framework.objects.Triangle
Create a new triangle at default position with default color.
Triangle(int, int, int, int, Color) - Constructor for class framework.objects.Triangle
Create a new triangle at a given position, with given size and color.
